- Phase II-B: Cloud-native & reusable agent skills

Bash(PYTHONPATH=. backend/venv/bin/python -c "
import sys
import os
sys.path.insert\(0, os.path.join\(os.getcwd\(\), ''.''\)\)

import asyncio
from backend.db.init_db import init_db_and_tables

async def main\(\):
    print\(''Verifying database tables exist...''\)
    await init_db_and_tables\(\)
    print\(''Database tables verified successfully!''\)

asyncio.run\(main\(\)\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.append\(''.''\)

# Test that all imports work without due_date
try:
    from models.task import Task, TaskCreate, TaskUpdate
    print\(''‚úÖ Task models imported successfully without due_date''\)
    
    # Verify TaskCreate doesn''t have due_date
    task_create = TaskCreate\(title=''Test'', description=''Test desc''\)
    assert not hasattr\(task_create, ''due_date''\), ''TaskCreate should not have due_date''
    print\(''‚úÖ TaskCreate has no due_date field''\)
    
    # Verify TaskUpdate doesn''t have due_date
    task_update = TaskUpdate\(title=''Test''\)
    assert not hasattr\(task_update, ''due_date''\), ''TaskUpdate should not have due_date''
    print\(''‚úÖ TaskUpdate has no due_date field''\)
    
    # Test that TaskService still works
    from services.task_service import TaskService
    print\(''‚úÖ TaskService imported successfully''\)
    
    # Test that API endpoints still work
    from api.v1.tasks import router
    print\(''‚úÖ API router imported successfully''\)
    
    print\(''\\nüéâ All functionality verified - due_date completely removed!''\)
    
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''‚ùå Error: {e}''\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")
